dict.acceptation: 乐意地；快捷地；轻而易举地；便利地；

sent.orig: They dissolve readily in water, dilute acids, and alkalis but do not coagulate readily on heating.
sent.trans: 组蛋白在水中很容易溶解，其水溶液呈弱酸性和碱性，加热时不立即凝结。

sent.orig: Hydraulic reclamation with dispersing technology is characterized by its good maneuverability, economy, readily availability, and continuity.
sent.trans: 摘要离散式吹填工艺具有机动性、经济性、速效性和连续性的特点。

sent.orig: Are first-aid kites well stocked &readily available on the factory floor?
sent.trans: 在工厂场地上是否常备有方便易用的急救箱？
